participant_1.name: Jordan Smith
participant_1.personality: Creative and imaginative, enjoys connecting with others through music and experiences.
participant_1.background: I try to do laundry at least once a week, but it can be hard to find the time. My favorite artist is 2pac. I am not wealthy but I do enjoy eating expensive seafood. I enjoy using my imagination to create new worlds and characters. I love going to concerts.

participant_2.name: Liam Johnson
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, loves sports and enjoys a lively atmosphere.
participant_2.background: My favorite place to eat is a sports bar where I can watch basketball games and enjoy my coffee with a shot of bourbon. I am twenty years old. I try to go out for a walk or do something to take my mind off things. I live alone. I love to be run.

content.text: Nice to meet you, I'm participant_2. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What are your hobbies?
I like to go to concerts and run. I also enjoy watching basketball games.
That's awesome! I love going to concerts too. What's your favorite genre of music?
I'm really into hip hop and rap. 2Pac is my favorite artist.
I love 2Pac too! He's one of my favorites too. I also like to listen to rock and pop music.
What's your favorite type of food?
I love seafood. I especially like eating lobster and crab.
I've never had lobster before, but I've heard it's delicious. I love crab legs!
You should try lobster! It's really good.
I will have to try it sometime.
It's a good thing you like to go for walks. Seafood is pretty expensive.
I know, right? But it's worth it!
I'm glad we agree on something.
